remarks: A continuous bounded function is integrable.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
cnbdibl.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. dom vol ) $.
cnbdibl.va $e |- ( ph -> ( vol ` A ) e. RR ) $.

cnbdibl.bd $e |- ( ph -> E. x e. RR A. y e. dom F ( abs ` ( F ` y ) ) <_ x ) $.
cnbdibl $p |- ( ph -> F e. L^1 ) $.
$d F x y $.
